docs.lead_paragraph: The regulations on testing new drugs and food additives on animals, to be proposed today by the Food and Drug Administration, represent the first substantial effort to insure the reliability of evidence for the safety and effectiveness of these chemicals.

headline.main: Animal Drug Test Guidelines; F.D.A. Proposals to Be the First Substantial Effort To Insure Data Reliability in Such Experimentation

docs.snippet: The regulations on testing new drugs and food additives on animals, to be proposed today by the Food and Drug Administration, represent the first substantial effort to insure the reliability of evidence for the safety and effectiveness of these...

docs.lead_paragraph: PEOPLE generally think of cancer as a capricious disease, one that usually stripes without warning or regard for the particular characteristics of individuals. In the case of certain leading types of cancer, this is not entirely true. There are individuals who can be distinguished ahead of time as facing a "high risk" of developing the disease.
docs.abstract: Article on breast cancer; detection methods and high risk factors noted (M)
